mapper.insert: insert into bas_customer_refund_record ( id, partner_id, agent_id, agent_name, agent_code, order_id, customer_id, mobile, fullname, source_type, source_id, refund_money, refund_time, money_info, status, create_time) values ( #{id}, #{partnerId}, #{agentId}, #{agentName}, #{agentCode}, #{orderId}, #{customerId}, #{mobile}, #{fullname}, #{sourceType}, #{sourceId}, #{refundMoney}, #{refundTime}, #{moneyInfo}, #{status}, #{createTime})
